com.resourcemanager.service

Interface AllocationService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllocationServiceImpl

    public interface AllocationService
    Provides an abstract interface for a single service layer for Allocations. The services do all the logic and data manipulation on the data model and pass the updated model to the persistence layer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAllocation(Allocation allocation)
      Persists a new Allocation in the data source.
      void deleteAllocation(Allocation allocation)
      Removes the Allocation from the data source.
      Allocation getAllocationById(java.lang.Long id)
      Optionally retrieves an Allocation from the data source by Id if it exists.
      java.util.List<Allocation> listAllocations()
      Retrieves all Allocations from the data source.
      java.util.List<Allocation> listRequiredAllocations(java.time.LocalDate startDate, java.time.LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves all Allocations from the data source that do not have an associated Resource.
      void updateAllocation(Allocation allocation)
      Updates an existing Allocation in the data source.
